      • stateToString

        public final java.lang.String stateToString(int n)

      • setState

        protected void setState(int newState)
        Change state if transition is permitted. In this implementation the only downward change permitted is CONNECTED to DISCONNECTED. Subclasses should tolerate closing closed connections.
